description: Pronunciation spelling of MC (“master of ceremonies”).

definitionGroups.group: Alternative form of MC in its senses as

examples: "I'm the emcee for tonight," he proclaimed. "I'll announce your program."

[…]  mutating into all-star line-ups of emcees spitting hot bars over familiar beats, then to a single crew spitting bars over familiar beats, then eventually to a single crew (or artist) spitting bars over unfamiliar beats.

verbs.description: emcee (third-person singular simple present emcees, present participle emceeing, simple past and past participle emceed)

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To act as the master of ceremonies (for).
(intransitive, music) To rap as part of a hip-hop performance.
